data.name: descr
data.value: This discord bot allows you to search directly from Discord. The results and links will be given in a stylized textual form.

data.name: search_cmd
data.value:
This command followed by a series name (etc. ...) allows you to search.
Ex: '!search One Piece'

data.name: i_want_you_cmd
data.value: This command allows to have the invitation link of the bot.

data.name: infos_cmd
data.value: Followed by a series name (etc...), this command gives some useful information and links related to the search. (name, genres, date, etc...)

data.name: msearch_cmd
data.value: searches for multiple results for the given keywords. And gives a link to the complete search for each result.

data.name: commands_cmd
data.value: Gives the list of usable commands.

data.name: P.S.
data.value: P.S: If you have an account with your Discord nickname, the searches will be added to your history. If you don't have one, the data will be saved and retrievable by creating an account with the same nickname.
